topic.title: Date and Time of Death - conformance rules

lines.i: The template provides information about the decedent's date and time of death.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( 2.16.840.113883.10.20.24.1.3 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.13"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:42)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:43)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:44)/@code="31211-6" Date of Death (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:45)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime with data type TS (CONF:46)
Provide the date and time of death if it is known.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:47)
Provide information relevant to the date/time of death in cases where the point in time can in no way be established. If needed, supplemental text may be added to indicate that date/time information, while present, is approximate.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:42)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:43)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:44)/@code="31211-6" Date of Death (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:45)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:47)
Provide information relevant to the date/time of death in cases where the point in time can in no way be established. If needed, supplemental text may be added to indicate that date/time information, while present, is approximate.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime with data type TS (CONF:46)
Provide the date and time of death if it is known.
